column.text: BrickingIt started when a brick fanatic wanted to rebuild their favourite items. Teaming up with a programmer they planned to create the ambitious application.

The app uses your phone camera to record a video which is then intelligently transformed into a 3D model. Paired with machine learning techniques, we compare your video to real life objects to see whether they are mechanical or organic to produce a more realistic model. Using common brick building combinations, your model is developed from the ground up with instructions available straight from the app.
